amendment.description: Amendment excludes searches and seizures carried out by the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms from the provisions of the bill relaxing the exclusionary rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to exclude the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms from the provisions of the bill relaxing the exclusionary rule. Under the amendment, evidence acquired by the BATF without a warrant would not be permissible in court even if it were obtained in good faith that the search was legal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Volkmer amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 198, 3 Present (Roll no. 101).
